name: Incompatible Species Episode 5: Don't Be Sorry, Be Better
name_original: Incompatible Species Episode 5: Don't Be Sorry, Be Better
description:
After Lucius's outburst at finding the use of a giant genofil in creating Omnitreat, he requires some straightening out. To make amends for his damages, he inspects an offer from his late grandfather's assistant, Klaus Triche. All Lucius and his group find turn the whole world on its head.

This is a standalone release for the fifth episode of Incompatible Species: Don't Be Sorry, Be Better. You can find the full compilation of releases up to now here: https://poxnixles.itch.io/incomspe
